modName: Ultimate Lore Loading Screen - English and French
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[img]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2017/38/3/1505906849-ulls-logo.png[/img]


[color=#ff0000][size=5][b][u][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/12381/?]SSE VERSION[/url]

/!ENGLISH!\[/u][/b][/size][/color]

[size=4][u][b]Description[/b][/u][/size][/center]
This mod adds [b]106 new conditionless loading screens[/b] with concept art from many [b]artists[/b] and with [b]lore informations[/b] from the [url=http://en.uesp.net/wiki/Lore][b]Unofficial[/b][/url][b][size=2][url=http://en.uesp.net/wiki/Lore] Elder Scrolls Pages[/url]. This mod was only tested for 1920x1080 resolution, let me know if you have any trouble on other resolutions.

[/size][/b]ULLS will have 5 big updates:
[list=1]
[*][i]ULLS: Skyrim[/i]
[*][i]ULLS: Oblivion[/i]
[*][i]ULLS: Morrowind[/i]
[*][i]ULLS: Online[/i]
[*][i]ULLS: Creatures[/i]
[/list]
Each one will brings informations about characters, locations and evenements supplied by his game (TES V, TES IV, TES III, TESO) so a lot of loading screens will be added on each update. 

The update, "1.0" is called [i]ULLS: General[/i] and contains:
[list]
[*][b]All the Daedric Princes[/b]
[*][b]The Nine Divines[/b]
[*][b]Lorkhan[/b]
[*][b]All the regions of Tamriel[/b]
[/list][b]
[/b]The actual update, "2.0" is called [i]ULLS: Skyrim[/i] and contains:
[list]
[*][b]All the major cities of Skyrim + Saarthal + Ravenrock + Solstheim[/b]
[*][b]The Dark Brotherhood + The Night Mother[/b]
[*][b]Alduin + Paarthurnax + Miraak + Dragon Priest[/b]
[*][b]The Greybeard + High Hrothgar + The Throat of the World + Jurgen Windcaller + Thu'um + Dragonborn[/b]
[*][b]Shor + Kyne + Sovngarde + Soul Cairn[/b]
[*][b]The College of Winterhold + The Forsworn[/b]
[*][b]Civil War + Ulfric + Tullius + Titus Mede II + Stormcloak[/b]
[*][b]Skyhaven + Delphine[/b]
[*][b]Draugr + Falmer[/b]
[*][b]Nord + Ysgramor + Werewolf + Skyforge[/b]
[/list]

[u][size=4]Installation

[/size][/u]Install the english version of the mod with NMM or Mod Organizer. If you want to manually install just drag and drop the .esp and the .bsa files into your Data folder.


[b][u][size=4]Credits

[/size][/u][/b]Thanks for all the artists and the lore contributors of the UESP !

[url=http://en.uesp.net/wiki/Lore]All the lore informations from the UESP[/url]
[url=https://www.deviantart.com/art/Nocturnal-334811617]Nocturnal by Milulya[/url]
[url=https://www.reddit.com/r/skyrim/comments/nbjqe/my_grandfather_paints_landscapes_last_week_he_saw/]Peryite by thinlikenate[/url]
[url=https://www.deviantart.com/art/TES-Sanguine-Rose-300355992]Sanguine by coupleofkooks[/url]
[url=https://coupleofkooks.deviantart.com/art/TES-Sheogorath-283266182]Sheogorath by coupleofkooks[/url]
[url=https://www.deviantart.com/art/Tamriel-Map-The-Elder-Scrolls-Universe-443838165]Tamriel Map by DwarfChieftain[/url]
[url=https://www.deviantart.com/art/Political-Map-of-Tamriel-4E193-Revised-290088030]Tamriel Map (2) by Jakhajay[/url]
[url=https://www.artstation.com/raylederer]Many images by the Concept Artist Raylederer[/url]
[url=https://www.elderscrollsonline.com/en-us/media]Most of the regions images from The Elder Scrolls Online (most by Jeremy Fenske)[/url]
[url=https://tesrenewal.com/forums/concept-art/completed-environment-conceptthe-nine-divines-stained-glass]Nine Divines stained glass by Karol Lukaszczyk (Lukkar)[/url]
[url=https://alexeyrudikov.deviantart.com/art/Red-Mountain-272801085]Morrowind (Red Mountain) by AlexeyRudikov[/url]
[url=https://alexeyrudikov.deviantart.com/art/Ald-ruhn-266954040]Morrowind (Ald'ruhn) by AlexeyRudikov[/url]
[url=http://vsbattles.wikia.com/wiki/Hircine]Hircine by ???[/url]
[url=https://www.imperial-library.info/content/maps]Most of the maps from The Imperial Library[/url]
[url=http://en.uesp.net/wiki/Legends:Heroes_of_Skyrim]Many images from The Elder Scrolls Legends[/url]
[url=https://inferna-assassin.deviantart.com/gallery/50073125/Skyrim-Crest]All the cities crest by Inferna-assassin[/url]
[url=https://hieronymus7z.blogspot.fr/]Miraak by Hieronymus7Z[/url]
[url=https://elleylie.deviantart.com/art/crisis-of-Winterhold-486104667]Winterhold by Elleylie[/url]
[url=https://vera-rei.deviantart.com/art/Dawnstar-618703098]Dawnstar by Vera-Rei[/url]
[url=https://kdrmickey.deviantart.com/art/Mists-of-Morthal-523126976]Morthal by kdrmickey[/url]
[url=https://isignrob.deviantart.com/art/Elder-Scrolls-Dragon-Priest-442910683]Dragon Priest by Isignrob[/url]
[url=https://lady-nerevar.deviantart.com/art/Day-10-Shor-267254446]Shor by Lady-Nerevar[/url]
[url=https://www.pinterest.fr/pin/377669118723900334/]Forsworn by Dezzz[/url]
[url=https://www.pinterest.fr/pin/363595369899896896/]Kyne by Radishez[/url]

[color=#ff0000][size=5][b][u]/!FRENCH!\[/u][/b][/size][/color]

[size=4][u][b]Description[/b][/u][/size]


Ce mod ajoute [b]106 nouveaux écrans de chargement[/b] avec des concepts arts d'artistes et des informations sur le lore tiré de la [url=http://lagbt.wiwiland.net/index.php?title=Accueil]Grande Bibliothèque de Tamriel[/url][b][size=2]. Ce mod a seulement été testé avec une résolution de 1920x1080, faites moi savoir si vous avez des problèmes avec d'autres résolutions.

[/size][/b]ULLS aura 5 grosses mises à jours:
[list=1]
[*][i][size=2]ULLS: Skyrim[/size][/i]
[*][i][size=2]ULLS: Oblivion[/size][/i]
[*][i][size=2]ULLS: Morrowind[/size][/i]
[*][i][size=2]ULLS: Online[/size][/i]
[*][i][size=2]ULLS: Creatures[/size][/i]
[/list]
Chacune de ces mises à jour apporteront leur lot d'informations sur les personnages, les lieux et les événements fournis par leur jeu (TES V, TES IV, TES III, TESO) donc attendez-vous à beaucoup de nouveaux écrans de chargement à l'avenir.

L'update "1.0" se nomme [i]ULLS:General[/i] et contient:
[list]
[*][b][size=1]Tous les Princes daedriques[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=1]Les Neuf Divins[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=1]Lorkhan[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=1]Toutes les provinces de Tamriel[/size][/b]
[/list]
L'update actuelle, "2.0" se nomme [i]ULLS:Skyrim[/i] et contient:
[list]
[*][b][size=1]Toutes les villes principales de Skyrim + Solstheim + Corberoc + Saarthal[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=1]La Confrérie Noire + La Mère de la Nuit[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=1]Alduin + Paarthurnax + Prêtre-Dragon + Miraak[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=1]Grisebarbe + la Gorge du Monde + Haut-Hrothgar + Jurgen Parlevent + L'Enfant de Dragon + Thu'um[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=1]Shor + Kyne + Sovngarde + Cairn de l'âme[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=1]Guerre Civile + Ulfric + Tullius + Titus Mede II + Sombrage[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=1]Delphine + Temple d'Havreciel[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=1]Draugr + Falmer[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=1]Nordique + Ysgramor + Loup-garou + Forgeciel[/size][/b]
[/list]

[u][size=4]Installation

[/size][/u]Installez la version française du mod avec NMM ou Mod Organizer. Si vous souhaitez l'installer manuellement, déplacez simplement le contenu de l'archive (.esp et .bsa) dans votre dossier Data.

[b][u][size=4]Credits

[/size][/u][/b]Merci à tous les artistes et aux contributeurs de la GBT !


[url=http://lagbt.wiwiland.net/index.php?title=Accueil]Toutes les informations sur le lore viennent de la GBT[/url]

author: Llulu

files.name: Ultimate Lore Loading Screen - English 2.0
files.changelogHtml:
Add the ULLS: Skyrim update which contains:
*All the major cities of Skyrim + Saarthal + Ravenrock + Solstheim
*The Dark Brotherhood + The Night Mother
*Alduin + Paarthurnax + Miraak + Dragon Priest
*The Greybeard + High Hrothgar + The Throat of the World + Jurgen Windcaller + Thu'um + Dragonborn
*Shor + Kyne + Sovngarde + Soul Cairn
*The College of Winterhold + The Forsworn
*Civil War + Ulfric + Tullius + Titus Mede II + Stormcloak
*Skyhaven + Delphine
*Draugr + Falmer
*Nord + Ysgramor + Werewolf + Skyforge
